columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the finding.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The time and date when the finding was created.

columns.name: confidence
columns.description: The confidence score for the finding.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used for the finding.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The time and date when the finding was last updated.

columns.name: resource
columns.description: Contains information about the AWS resource associated with the activity that prompted GuardDuty to generate a finding.

columns.name: service
columns.description: Contains additional information about the generated finding.
